<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Celestial Menagerie Bruiser](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2020)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 47</row>

**Perception** +14

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Circus Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), (Mask), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 135

**Opportunistic Brawler** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature hits the bruiser with a melee Strike; **Effect** The bruiser attempts to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) the creature. On a success or a critical success, the target is also knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). The bruiser can't Stride after a target it successfully Shoves in this way.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_greatclub_ +20 ([Backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 2d10+10 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+8 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+8 piercing

**Terrifying Sneer** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per turn; **Requirements** The bruiser must target a creature they [Shoved](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) since the end of the bruiser's last turn; **Effect** The bruiser attempts to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) the target. If the bruiser rolls a success, they gets a critical success instead.

</column>
name: Celestial Menagerie Bruiser
